snippet: The Hong Kong light and laser show this week appeared to include gigantic Chinese characters that read “People’s Liberation Army” on the side of the garrison’s waterfront headquarters, alarming many locals.
abstract: The Hong Kong light and laser show this week appeared to include gigantic Chinese characters that read “People’s Liberation Army” on the side of the garrison’s waterfront headquarters, alarming many locals.

headline.main: The People's Liberation Army, in Lights
